import sys

def main():
	t = int(sys.stdin.readline())

	for i in range(0, t):
		n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

		numbers = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

		for j in range(0, n - 1):
			if (j % 2 == 0):
				if (numbers[j] > numbers[j + 1]):
					temp = numbers[j]
					numbers[j] = numbers[j + 1]
					numbers[j + 1] = temp
			else: 
				if( numbers[j] < numbers[j + 1]):
					temp = numbers[j]
					numbers[j] = numbers[j + 1]
					numbers[j + 1] = temp

		for j in numbers:
			print j,			
		print
main()
